TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed SystemInformation extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemInformation extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class provides info about the app and the system.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void AddToAppUptime(valuetype System.TimeSpan duration) cil managed
Public Shared Sub AddToAppUptime (duration As TimeSpan)
.method public hidebysig instance void AddToAppUptime(valuetype System.TimeSpan duration) cil managed

Docs.param: The amount to time to add
Docs.summary: Adds to the record of how long the app has been running. Use this to optionally include time spent in background tasks or extended execution.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ApplicationName As String
Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationName As String

Docs.summary: Gets the application's name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ApplicationVersion As PackageVersion
Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationVersion As PackageVersion

Docs.summary: Gets the application's version.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AppUptime As TimeSpan
Public ReadOnly Property AppUptime As TimeSpan

Docs.summary: Gets the length of time this instance of the app has been running. Will be if has not been called yet.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AvailableMemory As Single
Public ReadOnly Property AvailableMemory As Single

Docs.summary: Gets the available memory.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Culture As CultureInfo
Public ReadOnly Property Culture As CultureInfo

Docs.summary: Gets the user's most preferred culture.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DeviceFamily As String
Public ReadOnly Property DeviceFamily As String

Docs.summary:
Gets the device's family.
Common values include:
"Windows.Desktop"
"Windows.Mobile"
"Windows.Xbox"
"Windows.Holographic"
"Windows.Team"
"Windows.IoT"
Prepare your code for other values.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DeviceManufacturer As String
Public ReadOnly Property DeviceManufacturer As String

Docs.summary: Gets the device's manufacturer. Will be empty if the manufacturer couldn't be determined (For example: when running in a virtual machine).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DeviceModel As String
Public ReadOnly Property DeviceModel As String

Docs.summary: Gets the device's model. Will be empty if the model couldn't be determined (For example: when running in a virtual machine).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property FirstUseTime As DateTime
Public ReadOnly Property FirstUseTime As DateTime

Docs.summary: Gets the DateTime (in UTC) when the app was launched for the first time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property FirstVersionInstalled As PackageVersion
Public ReadOnly Property FirstVersionInstalled As PackageVersion

Docs.summary: Gets the first version of the app that was installed. This will be the current version if a previous version of the app was installed before accessing this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Instance As SystemInformation

Docs.summary: Gets the unique instance of .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsAppUpdated As Boolean
Public ReadOnly Property IsAppUpdated As Boolean

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the app is being used for the first time since being upgraded from an older version. Use this to tell if you should display details about what has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property IsFirstRun As Boolean
Public ReadOnly Property IsFirstRun As Boolean

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the app is being used for the first time since it was installed. Use this to tell if you should do or display something different for the app's first use.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property LastLaunchTime As DateTime
Public ReadOnly Property LastLaunchTime As DateTime

Docs.summary: Gets the DateTime (in UTC) when the app was last launched, not including this instance. Will be if has not been called yet.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property LastResetTime As DateTime
Public ReadOnly Property LastResetTime As DateTime

Docs.summary: Gets the DateTime (in UTC) when the launch count was last reset. Will be if has not been called yet.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property LaunchCount As Long
Public ReadOnly Property LaunchCount As Long

Docs.summary: Gets the number of times the app has been launched. Will be 0 if has not been called yet.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task LaunchStoreForReviewAsync() cil managed
Public Shared Function LaunchStoreForReviewAsync () As Task

Docs.summary: Launches the store app so the user can leave a review.
Docs.remarks: This method needs to be called from your UI thread.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property LaunchTime As DateTime
Public ReadOnly Property LaunchTime As DateTime

Docs.summary: Gets the DateTime (in UTC) that this instance of the app was launched. Will be if has not been called yet.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property OperatingSystem As String
Public ReadOnly Property OperatingSystem As String

Docs.summary: Gets the operating system's name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property OperatingSystemArchitecture As ProcessorArchitecture
Public ReadOnly Property OperatingSystemArchitecture As ProcessorArchitecture

Docs.summary: Gets the processor architecture.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property OperatingSystemVersion As OSVersion
Public ReadOnly Property OperatingSystemVersion As OSVersion

Docs.summary: Gets the operating system's version.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PreviousVersionInstalled As PackageVersion

Docs.summary: Gets the previous version of the app that was installed. This will be the current version if a previous version of the app was installed before using or if the app is not updated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void ResetLaunchCount() cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void ResetLaunchCount() cil managed

Docs.summary: Resets the launch count.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TotalLaunchCount As Long
Public ReadOnly Property TotalLaunchCount As Long

Docs.summary: Gets the number of times the app has been launched. Will be 0 if has not been called yet.
